Integer.Name: AnswerTimeout
Integer.ToolTip: Time the GigE Vision Device can take for responding to a command from the application.
Integer.Description: Time the GigE Vision Device can take for responding to a command from the application.

Integer.Name: CommandRetryCount
Integer.ToolTip: Number of times a command is attempted before it is considered as failed.
Integer.Description: Number of times a command is attempted before it is considered as failed.

Integer.Name: DefaultMCTT
Integer.ToolTip: Value written to the message channel transmission timeout register (MCTT) at the time of connection
Integer.Description: Value written to the message channel transmission timeout register (MCTT) at the time of connection. The MCTT is the amount of time (in milliseconds) the GigE Vision device must wait before either timing out or receiving acknowledgment for a message (interrupt).

Integer.Name: DefaultMCRC
Integer.ToolTip: Value written to the message channel retry count register (MCRC) at the time of connection
Integer.Description: Value written to the message channel retry count register (MCRC) at the time of connection. The MCRC is the number of retransmissions allowed when the GigE Vision device times out waiting for acknowledgement of a message (interrupt).

Integer.Name: HeartbeatInterval
Integer.ToolTip: Time between each heartbeat sent by the software.
Integer.Description: Time in milliseconds between each heartbeat sent to the GigE Vision device.

Integer.Name: DefaultHeartbeatTimeout
Integer.ToolTip: Default heartbeat timeout value applied on connection.
Integer.Description: Default heartbeat timeout value applied on connection, in milliseconds. Applied on device connection. To change this value once the device is already connected, refer to the GevHeartbeatTimeout feature of your GigE Vision device.

Integer.Name: IPAddress
Integer.ToolTip: Local IP address used for communication.
Integer.Description: Local IP address used for communication.

Integer.Name: CommandPort
Integer.ToolTip: Local UDP port used for commands.
Integer.Description: Local UDP port used for the command link to the device.

Integer.Name: MessagingPort
Integer.ToolTip: Local UDP port used for messaging channel.
Integer.Description: Local UDP port used for messaging channel.

Boolean.Name: ForcedCommandPortEnabled
Boolean.ToolTip: Enables the use of ForcedCommandPort for CommandPort.
Boolean.Description: Enables the use of ForcedCommandPort for CommandPort. If not enabled, a system-assigned port number is used. If enabled, uses ForcedCommandPort.

Integer.Name: ForcedCommandPort
Integer.ToolTip: Port to use for CommandPort.
Integer.Description: Port to use for CommandPort when connecting to the device. Used by the command link UDP socket. This parameter is only considered when connecting to the device.

Boolean.Name: ForcedMessagingPortEnabled
Boolean.ToolTip: Enables the use of ForcedMessagingPort for MessagingPort.
Boolean.Description: Enables the use of ForcedMessagingPort for MessagingPort. If not enabled, a system-assigned port number is used. If enabled, uses ForcedMessagingPort.

Integer.Name: ForcedMessagingPort
Integer.ToolTip: Port to use for MessagingPort.
Integer.Description: Port to use for MessagingPort when connecting to the device. Used by the messaging channel UDP socket. This parameter is only considered when connecting to the device.

Integer.Name: CommandPendingAcknowledges
Integer.ToolTip: Count of pending acknowledges on the command link.
Integer.Description: Count of pending acknowledges since the device was connected or the statistics were reset. Pending acknowledges on the command link are sent by the device when performning longer command processing to avoid GVCP timeouts.

Integer.Name: CommandRetries
Integer.ToolTip: Count of retries on the command link.
Integer.Description: Count of retries since the device was connected or the statistics were reset. Retries on the command link are initiated by the host if the command acknowledge is not received whithin AnswerTimeout.

Integer.Name: CommandRetriesMax
Integer.ToolTip: Maximum retries used for a single command.
Integer.Description: Maximum retries sent to the device for a single command.

Integer.Name: CommandSendFailures
Integer.ToolTip: Count of command link transmission failures.
Integer.Description: Counts the number of transmission failures of the command link. As UDP does not garantee delivery, only failures by the network stack to put the packet on the wire are reported.

Integer.Name: MessagingRetries
Integer.ToolTip: Count of retries on the messaging channel.
Integer.Description: Count of messaging channel retries since the device was connected or the statistics were reset. Retries on the messaging channel are initiated by the device if the event acknowledge is not received whithin the period of time specified in the MCTT register. See DefaultMCTT and DefaultMCRC.

Integer.Name: MessagingRetriesMax
Integer.ToolTip: Maximum retries used for a single event.
Integer.Description: Maximum retries requested by the device (and received by the host) for a single event.

Integer.Name: MessagingAckSendFailures
Integer.ToolTip: Count of messaging channel event acknowledge transmission failures.
Integer.Description: Counts the number of transmission failures of event acknowledges on the messaging channel. As UDP does not garantee delivery, only failures by the network stack to put the packet on the wire are reported.

Boolean.Name: AutoNegotiation
Boolean.ToolTip: Application level parameter used by eBUS Player and Net Command. When true, automatic packet size negotiation is performed.
Boolean.Description: Application level parameter used by eBUS Player and Net Command. When true, automatic packet size negotiation is performed. Note that this does not affect the behaviour of PvDeviceGEV::Connect. From an API perspective, automatic packet size negotiation may be performed using PvDeviceGEV::NegotiatePacketSize.

Integer.Name: DefaultPacketSize
Integer.ToolTip: Application level parameter used by eBUS Player and NetCommand. Packet size initially assigned to the device for streaming if packet size auto negotiation is disabled.
Integer.Description: Application level parameter used by eBUS Player and NetCommand. Packet size initially assigned to the device for streaming if packet size auto negotiation is disabled. If this value is refused by the device, a fallback value of 576 is used. Note that this does not affect the behaviour of PvDeviceGEV::Connect. From an API perspective, automatic packet size negotiation may be performed using PvDeviceGEV::NegotiatePacketSize.

Enumeration.Name: DeviceGenICamXMLLocation
Enumeration.ToolTip: Selects which GenICam XML file SDK will use to build the device node map on the next connect.
Enumeration.Description: Selects which GenICam configuration file the SDK will use for the next connect. "Default" goes through all manifest entries (if supported and enabled) and then URL1, URL2 until the device node map can be successfully built. "File" reads from the XML file in the location specified by DeviceGenICamXMLFile.

StringReg.Name: DeviceGenICamXMLFile
StringReg.ToolTip: The location on the hard drive (absolute path) where the local XML file is loaded from when DeviceXMLLocation is set to "File".
StringReg.Description: The location on the hard drive (absolute path) where the local XML file is loaded from when DeviceXMLLocation is set to "File".

Boolean.Name: UseManifests
Boolean.ToolTip: Enables the use of the manifest when retrieving the GenICam XML file from the device.
Boolean.Description: Enables the use of the manifest when retrieving the GenICam XML file from the device.

Boolean.Name: LinkRecoveryEnabled
Boolean.ToolTip: When enabled, SDK attempts to automatically reconnect to the same device when the connection is lost. SDK does not recover the stream. Application is responsible for stream recovery.
Boolean.Description: When enabled, SDK attempts to automatically reconnect to the same device when the connection is lost. SDK does not recover the stream. Application is responsible for stream recovery.

Enumeration.Name: RecoveryStatus
Enumeration.ToolTip: Status of the connection and stream state machine.
Enumeration.Description: Status of the connection and stream state machine.

Integer.Name: Connected
Integer.ToolTip: ToolTip
Integer.Description: Description

Port.Name: Device
Port.ToolTip: Port giving access to the device.
